Richard Oxford is owner of Richard Oxford Financial .Not all management styles work in various market cycles all the time, that's why we employ a "multi-strategy" management style. When volatile markets dictate, we are more tactical in nature to take advantage of weakness in the market. When the markets are more stable and healthy, we employ more of a strategic management style. Simply stated; we match our management style based on current market conditions.Richard Oxford Financial features a highly-trained, experienced financial professionals who work as a team to support strategic alliances and their clients, including CPA Firms, Attorneys, Banks, Employee Benefits, Hedge funds, and Property & Casualty relationships.Some of the key services that Richard Oxford and his company provides:• Investment Management• Alternative Investments• Trust & Estate Planning• Insurance Consulting and planning• Small Business Accounting• Tax Planning• Wealth Transfer StrategyTo reach Richard Oxford, please call 602-697-7657, Monday through Friday, 8am to 5pm, or email him at rick@richardoxford.com. www.richardoxfordfinancial.com*Investment Advisor | Financial Planner | Financial Advisor | Annuities | Life Insurance | Business Planning

Private Client Group is a wealth advisory firm that utilizes tactical asset management and prudent wealth strategies that are designed to generate strong returns while reducing the level of risk that is found in most investment portfolios. Our goal is to provide wealth creation strategies that generate strong returns relative to the amount of risk taken. This allows risk conscious investors the ability to comfortably allocate a higher portion of their investment portfolios to segments of the financial markets that have historically generated the highest returns. Our services allow clients peace of mind knowing investments they have worked hard to accumulate are being monitored on a regular basis and adjusted as needed.

Richard is very unusual. I cannot speak too highly about his professionalism, ethics and dedication. Without doubt he is a "straight arrow" and a respected friend/associate  He is honest in his words and actions, very direct and dedicated to the best interests of those he is associated. To say he is principled is an understatement. For nearly 15 years, I have known him as a focused, driven  student in his MBA program, and as business partner. I am lucky to have had the pleasure to associate with him. I would trust him always with just a hand shake. His word is his bond.

summary: Richard Oxford is an Investment Advisor Representative with Richard Oxford Financial and a tax planning specialist with Scottsdale Tax Group.Richard Oxford has had a diverse career that began with his acceptance to the Naval, Air Force and Coast Guard Academies. Choosing a different path, he graduated from Northern Arizona University with a degree in Geology in 1979. Along the way he ran on the track team for two years. He spent over 20 years in the heavy construction industry completing a Masters of Business Administration at night. As a Senior Project Manager for the largest structural steel contractor in the SW, he completed major projects in Arizona, California, Texas and Nevada culminating with the Eiffel Tower Replica in Las Vegas. Richard was Chief Operating Officer for the International Import Export Institute (Now Dunlap-Stone University) for four years.  In this position, he helped build what was initially an online training and certification company into an accredited college serving students around the world. He still has ownership and serves on the Board of Directors.His entry into finance came as an invitation to join his brother in starting Oxford Legacy Planning. As CEO, he helped build this charitable planning company from scratch. This experience with charitable planning and trusts has proven invaluable to planning his clients’ needs.  For the past 10 years he has been helping people meet their financial goals.Tax Planning | Investment Adv | Financial Planner | Financial Advisor | Annuities | Life Insurance | Tax Prep
